Subject: Heading for seperate minds

Octociz/Brix emereged out of the CR Chamber, as healthy as any bot 
with two spraks inside them could be. But it was growing worse. Both 
could feel the huge gaping hole inside them, and if Octociz didn't 
get a new body soon, than both would go inside, and fight each other 
to the death for control of the body. Maybe both wouldn't survive. He 
headed to the bay area, where a small one man transport pod was 
waiting. He hoped in and sent a message to Ramulus:

"Hey, I'm on my way. If you get there first wait for me. I'll be 
there soon."

 Brix, an acknowledge Maximal pilot, learned the control easily and 
launched the Transport towards the pod.
